content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_ldw
GO

SELECT TOP(100)
            year,
            month,
            tz.borough,
            CONVERT(DATE,td.lpep_pickup_datetime)AS trip_date,
            cal.day_name AS trip_day,
            CASE
                WHEN cal.day_name IN ('Saturday','Sunday') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' 
            END AS trip_weekend_ind
            SUM(CASE
                    WHEN pt.description = 'Crtedit card' THEN 1 ELSE 0 
                END )AS cash_trip_count
            SUM(CASE
                    WHEN pt.description = 'Cash' THEN 1 ELSE 0 
                END )AS card_trip_count
    FROM silver.vw_trip_data_green td
    JOIN silver.taxi_zone tz
    ON (td.pu_location_id = tz.location_id)
    JOIN silver.calendar cal
    ON(cal.date = CONVERT(DATE,td.lpep_pickup_datetime))
    JOIN silver.payment_type pt
    ON(td.payment_type = pt.payment_type)
    WHERE td.year= '2020' AND td.month = '01'
    GROUP BY td.year,td.month,tz.borough,CONVERT(DATE,td.lpep_pickup_datetime),
    cal.day_name
